metadataAttributes.id: SAT-03 - Role-Based Cybersecurity & Data Privacy Training
metadataAttributes.title: SAT-03 - Role-Based Cybersecurity & Data Privacy Training
metadataAttributes.summary:
Mechanisms exist to provide role-based cybersecurity & data privacy-related training: 
 - Before authorizing access to the system or performing assigned duties; 
 - When required by system changes; and 
 - Annually thereafter.
